title: Web Developer Intern
description:
**Web Developer Intern (Paid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance, with a Certificate of Internship.
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation company offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. We focus on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a
 **Web Developer Intern** 
 , you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain
 **responsive websites** 
 using
 **HTML** 
 ,
 **CSS** 
 ,
 **JavaScript** 
 , and
 **frameworks** 
 such as
 **React.js** 
 ,
 **Bootstrap** 
 , or
 **Tailwind CSS** 
 .
* Work with backend technologies like
 **Node.js** 
 ,
 **Django** 
 , or
 **PHP** 
 for full\\-stack web solutions.
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web layouts.
* Integrate APIs and handle client–server communication efficiently.
* Optimize websites for
 **speed** 
 ,
 **performance** 
 , and
 **SEO best practices** 
 .
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure smooth user experience.



**Requirements** 



* Pursuing/completed Bachelor’s or Master’s in
 **Computer Science** 
 ,
 **IT** 
 , or related fields.
* Proficiency in
 **HTML5** 
 ,
 **CSS3** 
 ,
 **JavaScript** 
 , and basic understanding of
 **frontend frameworks** 
 .
* Familiarity with
 **backend technologies** 
 (Node.js, Python Flask/Django, or PHP).
* Understanding of
 **databases** 
 (MySQL, MongoDB) and
 **Git version control** 
 .
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation.



**Perks \\& Benefits** 



* Certificate of Internship from Webs IT Solution.
* Work on
 **real\\-world web projects** 
 with live deployment.
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers.
* Opportunity to build a strong professional portfolio.
* Placement and networking assistance post\\-internship.



 💰
 **Stipend:** 
 ₹7,500 – ₹15,000
 *(Performance\\-Based)*

title: Python Developer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Senior Python Engineer
 



**Location:** 
 Noida / Gurgaon / Bangalore (Hybrid – 2–3 days per week)
 



**Work Hours:** 
 2:00 PM – 11:00 PM IST
 



**Experience:** 
 5\\+ years \\|\\| Full\\-Time
 



  





**Position Overview:** 




 We are seeking an experienced
 **Senior Python Engineer** 
 to design, develop, and optimize scalable backend systems and APIs. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in
 **FastAPI** 
 ,
 **AWS cloud services** 
 , and
 **database management** 
 , with experience in
 **event\\-driven architectures** 
 using
 **Amazon SQS** 
 . Exposure to
 **AI/ML model integration** 
 or
 **data\\-intensive applications** 
 is highly desirable.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and mainy, IAM).
* Implement and optimize
 **event\\-driven architectures** 
 using Amazon SQS and related messaging tools.
* Design, monitor, and optimize
 **PostgreSQL** 
 and
 **MongoDB** 
 databases for performance and reliability.
* Collaborate with
 **AI/ML and Data Science teams** 
 to integrate models into backend workflows.
* Ensure secure API development using
 **OAuth2** 
 ,
 **JWT** 
 , and modern authorization techniques.
* Participate in
 **architecture design** 
 ,
 **performance tuning** 
 , and
 **code reviews** 
 .
* Promote
 **best coding practices** 
 , maintain clean, testable, and scalable codebases.
* Contribute to continuous integration, deployment, and team mentorship.



  





**Required Skills \\& Experience:** 



* 5\\+ years of professional experience in
 **Python backend development** 
 .
* Strong expertise in
 **FastAPI** 
 , or solid experience in
 **Flask/Django** 
 with migration exposure to FastAPI.
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **AWS services** 
 (Lambda, ECS/EKS, S3, CloudWatch, API Gateway, IAM).
* Proven proficiency with
 **Amazon SQS** 
 or other messaging/queueing systems.
* Advanced knowledge of
 **PostgreSQL** 
 and
 **MongoDB** 
 .
* Experience integrating
 **AI/ML models** 
 or working on
 **data\\-driven systems** 
 .
* Strong understanding of
 **API security** 
 and authentication standards.
* Familiarity with
 **CI/CD pipelines** 
 ,
 **Docker** 
 , and
 **Kubernetes/ECS** 
 .
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills for remote team environments.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Experience building
 **high\\-availability** 
 and
 **high\\-performance** 
 systems.
* Exposure to
 **Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)** 
 and
 **DevOps practices** 
 .
* Understanding of
 **monitoring and logging tools** 
 (CloudWatch, Prometheus, ELK stack).
* Prior experience in
 **Agile** 
 or
 **startup environments** 
 is a plus.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
💻 Position: Senior Frontend Developer
 



 📍Location: Bangalore
 



 🗓️ Working Days: 5 days
 



 📌 Experience Required: 3\\-5 years
 



 🤝 Client: AI powered document automation platform
 



  





 Responsibilities
 


* Build and maintain our client’s cross\\-platform desktop app (Electron \\+ JavaScript/TypeScript).
* Develop intelligent frontend workflows using React, TypeScript, and CSS3\\.
* Ship cross\\-platform (Windows \\& macOS) builds using Electron.
* Collaborate with design and product to deliver pixel\\-perfect UIs.
* Tackle performance bottlenecks and ship stable, fast features.
* Participate in product and architecture decisions.



  





 Requirements
 


* 3 to 5 years of experience in product engineering.
* 1 to 2 years of deep experience with Electron and desktop development.
* Strong command over JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS3, React.
* Experience building desktop apps at scale.
* Experience with MERN stack and Python\\-based backends (Flask, Celery) is a plus.
* A product\\-first mindset: curious, proactive, and detail\\-oriented.



  





 Pay and Benefits
 


* Competitive salary based on experience.
* Unlimited leaves (including sick leaves, period leaves, and more).
* Inclusive, diverse, and innovation\\-first work culture.
* Flexible work hours and remote\\-friendly team.
* Work directly with the Founder \\& Head of engineering.
* A high\\-autonomy, zero\\-politics environment that values growth and ownership.

title: Back End Developer
description:
About
 



 We are hiring for Enroly, we are an award\\-winning EdTech company on a mission to revolutionize international student recruitment and admissions. Fast\\-paced, innovative, and scaling rapidly, we’re looking for a Backend Engineer to join our dynamic technology team. If you’re passionate about building high\\-performance, cost\\-efficient SaaS solutions and exploring cutting\\-edge technologies like WASM to enhance frontend performance, we want to hear from you.
 



 Your Role
 



 As a Backend Engineer, you’ll have a pivotal role in shaping the future of our flagship product, the Enroly CAS Shield platform. You will develop performant, scalable integrations and APIs that empower our customers to seamlessly connect their systems to ours. Working in a product\\-driven environment, you will leverage the latest technologies to drive impact and innovation.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 



 ● Build and Maintain Integrations: Design, implement, and maintain integrations that enable customers to connect their internal systems with the Enroly CAS Shield platform.
 



 ● API Development: Develop and optimize APIs and tools to ensure seamless interaction between our platform and customer systems.
 



 ● Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, engineers, and customer support teams to gather requirements and deliver impactful solutions.
 



 ● Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve integration issues reported by customers or internal teams.
 



 ● Documentation and Training: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials to support customer integrations.
 



 ● Stay Current: Research and apply the latest integration technologies and best practices to continuously improve our offerings.
 



 What We’re Looking For
 



 ● Proven experience with microservices or event\\-driven architectures.
 



 ● Strong proficiency in TypeScript (experience with Python or Rust is a plus, with the willingness to learn).
 



 ● Hands\\-on experience with SQL\\-based and NoSQL (Document\\-based) databases.
 



 ● Deep understanding of AWS services and cloud environments.
 



 ● Familiarity with AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) and services like Lambda, SQS, S3, Cognito, EventBridge, and more.
 



 ● Experience with DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, Docker, and GitHub Actions.
 



 ● Strong knowledge of security best practices for APIs and data privacy.
 



 ● Proficiency in unit, integration, and API testing using Jest.
 



 ● Ability to optimize software for performance and cost\\-efficiency in cloud environments.
 



 ● Excellent problem\\-solving abilities and troubleshooting skills.
 



 ● Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts to diverse audiences.
 



 ● Detail\\-oriented with a commitment to delivering high\\-quality, reliable work.
 



 Our Tech Stack
 



 ● Languages: Node.js, TypeScript, React
 



 ● Databases: PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Redis
 



 ● AWS Services: Lambda, SQS, S3, Cognito, EventBridge, CloudFormation, Fargate, SES, CodeBuild, CodePipeline, CloudFront, API Gateway, and more.
 



 What’s in It for You?
 



 ● The opportunity to work on a groundbreaking product with a direct impact on transforming the EdTech landscape.
 



 ● A collaborative, fast\\-paced environment that values innovation and continuous learning.
 


* ● Exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies and the ability to shape the future of integrations for our platform.

title: Django Full Stack Developer
description:
**About Qubitara Technologies:** 





 Qubitara Technologies Private Limited is a Bangalore\\-based digital transformation company focused on Data Engineering, Infrastructure Modernization, and Custom Software Development. Our mission is to power the digital future by building scalable, cloud\\-native solutions with a strong foundation in modern architecture, analytics, and automation.
 





 Our team includes highly certified professionals – including product managers, analysts, data engineers/scientists, and full\\-stack developers – working together to deliver impactful, tailored SaaS and enterprise solutions.
 




  





**Role Overview:** 





 We are seeking a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Python (Django), React.js, and React Native, capable of building full\\-featured web and mobile applications, as well as secure and scalable backend services. The role involves close collaboration with our product, DevOps, and design teams to develop end\\-to\\-end features across our SaaS ecosystem.
 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop cross\\-platform mobile apps using React Native (iOS \\& Android).
* Build dynamic web applications with React.js \\+ TailwindCSS.
* Design, build, and maintain secure backend services using Django.
* Expose GraphQL and REST APIs for both mobile and web consumers.
* Implement and manage RBAC (Role\\-Based Access Control) systems in multi\\-tenant environments.
* Integrate with PostgreSQL/MySQL databases and optimize complex queries.
* Work with Auth0 for authentication and authorization flows.
* Utilize AWS ElastiCache (Redis) for caching, session storage, and performance tuning.
* Collaborate with DevOps for CI/CD and deploy to AWS Cloud (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3, CloudFront).



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 



* 3–5 years of hands\\-on experience in full\\-stack development.
* Strong experience in Python \\+ Django backend development.
* Proficient in React.js (web) and React Native (mobile).
* Strong grasp of JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and TailwindCSS/Bootstrap.
* Good understanding and working knowledge of GraphQL (Apollo / Hasura / Federation) and REST APIs.
* Practical experience implementing RBAC policies and permission structures.
* Experience working with ORMs (Django ORM, SQLAlchemy, etc.) and relational databases.
* Hands\\-on usage of Git, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience using Auth0 for secure user authentication and identity management.
* Working knowledge of Redis via AWS ElastiCache.
* Strong communication and team collaboration skills.



  

  





**Nice to Have:** 





 Experience with mobile performance optimization and publishing to app stores.
 





 Exposure to multi\\-tenant SaaS architecture.
 





 Familiarity with Terraform, Kubernetes, or AWS IaC.
 





 Micro\\-frontend experience using Nx\\-Mono Repo, Webpack Module Federation or Single\\-SPA.
 




  





**How to Apply:** 





 Please send your updated resume to hr@qubitara.com including below screening questions.
 





 Subject Line:
 
*Application – Python Full Stack Developer* 



1. What is your total experience (in months)?
2. Are you willing to join as a full\\-time employee?
3. Are you open to part\\-time engagement if applicable?
4. What is your current in\\-hand monthly salary (₹)?
5. What is your current CTC (₹ in LPA)?
6. What is your expected CTC (₹ in LPA)?
7. Have you implemented RBAC in your current or past projects?
8. Have you used Auth0 in any of your projects?
9. What is your official notice period (in days)?
10. Are you currently serving your notice period?
11. How soon can you join us (in days)?



  






 Or apply via LinkedIn.

**About the Role** 




 As a Senior Quality Assurance Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the delivery of high\\-quality, reliable software products. You will be responsible for designing and executing comprehensive test plans, identifying defects, and collaborating closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to maintain the highest quality standards across all releases.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop, maintain, and execute detailed test plans, test cases, and automation scripts.
* Identify, document, and track defects, working with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to define quality requirements and acceptance criteria.
* Conduct functional, regression, performance, and usability testing across multiple platforms.
* Continuously improve QA processes, tools, and automation frameworks to increase efficiency and coverage.
* Participate in sprint planning, daily standups, and release readiness activities.
* Provide quality metrics and reports to stakeholders for informed decision\\-making.



**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* 5\\+ years of experience in quality assurance or software testing, with at least 2 years in a senior or lead capacity.
* Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
* Hands\\-on experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Playwright).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and agile development environments.
* Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and documentation skills.
* Ability to work independently in a distributed team setting.
* Fluency in English is required; Arabic is an advantage.



**What’s Offered** 



* Full\\-time remote role open to candidates across the MENA region.
* Competitive compensation package.
* Opportunity to work on innovative software solutions impacting global users.
* Collaborative, fast\\-paced, and technology\\-driven environment.
* Career growth opportunities with a company committed to continuous improvement and innovation.



**Apply Now** 




 If you are passionate about building exceptional software quality standards and want to make a direct impact on product excellence, we encourage you to apply today.

title: Senior/Lead Firmware Design Engineer
description:
Position Overview
 
 Job Title: Senior/Lead Firmware Design Engineer
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Job type: Full time
 



  
 



 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Senior/Lead Firmware Design Engineer to join our dynamic team. This is an excellent opportunity for experienced developers with a minimum of 6 years’ proven experience in firmware development, particularly with STM32 microcontrollers and Embedded Linux platforms. The ideal candidate will possess both bare\\-metal coding and RTOS expertise, and demonstrate the ability to deliver robust, high\\-quality firmware solutions in a remote working environment.
 


 Key Responsibilities
 
 ·     Design, develop, and maintain firmware for STM32 microcontrollers and Embedded Linux systems.
 



 ·     Work on both bare\\-metal and RTOS\\-based firmware projects, ensuring best practices and code quality.
 



 ·     Collaborate closely with hardware and software engineers to define system requirements and deliver integrated solutions.
 



 ·     Lead technical discussions and provide mentorship to junior team members when required.
 



 ·     Participate in code reviews, debugging, testing, and optimisation of firmware for reliability and efficiency.
 



 ·     Contribute to the architecture and evolution of firmware platforms, ensuring scalability and maintainability.
 



 ·     Document design specifications, processes, and test procedures clearly and thoroughly.
 



 ·     Effectively manage time and priorities while working remotely and independently.
 


 Essential Requirements
 
 ·     Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electronics, Computer Engineering, or a related discipline.
 



 ·     Minimum of 6 years’ hands\\-on experience in firmware design and development.
 



 ·     Extensive experience with STM32 microcontrollers and associated development environments (e.g., STM32Cube, Keil, IAR, GCC).
 



 ·     Strong proficiency in Embedded Linux development and integration.
 



 ·     Demonstrated expertise in both bare\\-metal programming and RTOS (e.g., FreeRTOS, ThreadX, or similar) environments.
 



 ·     Solid understanding of hardware\\-software integration, peripherals, communication protocols (SPI, I2C, UART, etc.).
 



 ·     Strong debugging and problem\\-solving skills, including use of oscilloscopes, logic analysers, and software tools.
 



 ·     Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a remote and collaborative team setting.
 



 ·     Proven track record of delivering high\\-quality, maintainable, and well\\-documented firmware.
 


 Desirable Skills:
 
 ·     Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
 



 ·     Knowledge of security best practices in embedded systems.
 



 ·     Experience with automated build and CI/CD pipelines for firmware projects.
 



 ·     Understanding of regulatory standards relevant to embedded products (e.g., CE, FCC).
 



 ·     Previous leadership or mentoring experience within firmware development teams.
 



 ·     
 **Immediate availability is highly desirable.** 



 What We Offer
 
 ·     Competitive salary package.
 



 ·     Fully remote position with flexible working hours.
 



 ·     Comprehensive health insurance.
 



 ·     Opportunity to be part of a highly competent, globally distributed team.
 



 ·     Supportive and inclusive work environment that values innovation and personal growth.
 



 ·     Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
 



 ·     Work on innovative, high\\-impact projects.
 


 How to Apply
 
 If you are ready to make a meaningful impact and work on exciting projects with a world\\-class team, please submit your CV, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and availability. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

title: Gen AI Architect (H/F) - SAFRAN ENGINEERING SERVICES INDIA PVT LTD
description:
Safran est un groupe international de haute technologie opérant dans les domaines de l'aéronautique (propulsion, équipements et intérieurs), de l'espace et de la défense. Sa mission : contribuer durablement à un monde plus sûr, où le transport aérien devient toujours plus respectueux de l'environnement, plus confortable et plus accessible. Implanté sur tous les continents, le Groupe emploie 100 000 collaborateurs pour un chiffre d'affaires de 27,3 milliards d'euros en 2024, et occupe, seul ou en partenariat, des positions de premier plan mondial ou européen sur ses marchés. Safran est la 2ème entreprise du secteur aéronautique et défense du classement « World's Best Companies 2024 » du magazine TIME. Safran Electrical \\& Power est l'un des leaders mondiaux des systèmes électriques aéronautiques. La société est un acteur clé dans le domaine de l'électrification des équipements et de la propulsion électrique et hybride. Elle compte 14 000 collaborateurs répartis dans 13 pays.
   

  

 Descriptif mission
   

  

 We are seeking a highly experienced Generative AI Architect to lead the design and development of an AI platform that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) and other cutting\\-edge AI technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for architecting scalable systems that process unstructured data (such as PDFs of technical documents) and generate structured outputs. You will collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and product teams to build an end\\-to\\-end AI\\-driven platform for real\\-world applications.
   

  

 Technical skills required Level GenAI (LMM) Technology \\& Architecture Practitioner Cloud(AWS) Based solution dev. (EC2, AWS Bedrock, EKS, microservices) Practitioner LLM \\& Transformer based models \\- Selection, integration and optimization Expert Datapipeline engineering Practitioner AI \\- Computer vision skills Practitioner Product security Beginner
